item.title: Duck Typing in Python
item.description: What is Duck Typing? Python is a dynamic language which is strongly typed. Dynamic binding is the capability to use an instance without regard for its type. It is handled entirely through a simple attribute lookup process. Whenever an attribute is accessed as object.attribute: attribute is located by searching within the instance itself. This yields a positive result when the attribute being searched for is an instance variable or method.
